description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Become a Dragon and face up to three of your friends in an epic battle! Conquer the realm and become the Dragon God.  Breathe fireballs at your opponents to destroy their Eggs. Destroy Villages to gain Powerups and buy upgrades to keep evolving your Dragon. Can you be the Last Dragon Standing?
